briefTitle: The ORIGIN Trial (Outcome Reduction With Initial Glargine Intervention)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, International Randomized, 2x2 Factorial Design Study to Evaluate the Effects of Lantus (Insulin Glargine) Versus Standard Care, and of Omega-3 Fatty Acids Versus Placebo, in Reducing Cardiovascular Morbidity and Mortality in High Risk People With Impaired Fasting Glucose (IFG), Impaired Glucose Tolerance (IGT) or Early Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus: The ORIGIN Trial (Outcome Reduction With Initial Glargine Intervention)

interventions.name: reusable pen device for insulin injection

arms.label: Insulin glargine + omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids
Standard care + omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acids

primaryOutcome.measure: Composite of the First Occurrence of Cardiovascular (CV) Death, Nonfatal Myocardial Infarction (MI) or Nonfatal Stroke
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: from randomization until study cut-off date (median duration of follow-up: 6.2 years)
